devdoc.author: Juan M. Sanchez M.

ERC2981InvalidDefaultRoyalty(uint256,uin.details: The default royalty set is invalid (eg. (numerator / denominator) >= 1).

ERC2981InvalidDefaultRoyaltyReceiver(add.details: The default royalty receiver is invalid.

ERC2981InvalidTokenRoyalty(uint256,uint2.details: The royalty set for an specific `tokenId` is invalid (eg. (numerator / denominator) >= 1).

ERC2981InvalidTokenRoyaltyReceiver(uint2.details: The royalty receiver for `tokenId` is invalid.

StringsInsufficientHexLength(uint256,uin.details: The `value` string doesn't fit in the specified `length`.

params.salePrice: the sale price of the NFT asset specified by _tokenId
params.tokenId: the NFT asset queried for royalty information

returns._0: address		address of who should be sent the royalty payment
returns._1: uint256		the royalty payment amount for _salePrice sale price

devdoc.title: ERC2981 facet for RAIR diamond contracts

royaltyInfo(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the fee for the NFT sale
